{"id":868722427,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"6 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1672523230,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2612 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/868722427/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"31.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int pivotIndex(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int indx = -1;\n        int l = 0 , r = 0;\n        for(int i = 0 ; i < nums.size() ; i ++)\n        {\n            l = 0 , r = 0;\n            for(int j = 0 ; j < i ; j ++)\n            {\n                l += nums[j];\n            }\n\n            for(int k = i+1 ; k < nums.size() ; k ++)\n            {\n               r += nums[k];\n            }\n\n            if(l == r)\n            {\n                 indx = i;\n                 break;\n             }\n        }\n        return indx;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false}
